alert.note: Alert for Northwest Monroe; West Polk (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 12 at 2:05AM CST until January 13 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, south winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. * WHERE...Northwest Monroe and West Polk Counties. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 7 AM this morning to 7 PM EST this evening. For the Wind Advisory, from 7 PM this evening to 1 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
